website_summaries.verdict: Large infotainment screen and DVD player meant for most modern cars.
pros: Large 7-inch screen is clear and visible from rear row seats
Comes with both Android Auto and Apple CarPlay for hands-free control via voice command
cons: Onscreen controls lack the refinement of professional-factory infotainment systems

website_summaries.verdict: Entertainment on wheels with its big screen and easy connectivity to your smartphone and streaming services.
pros: Compatible with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto
AppRadio Mode + makes it easy to play streaming services such as Spotify and Pandora
cons: Some drivers have difficulty syncing to Bluetooth and controlling the radio via the steering wheel

customer_reviews.title: The Pioneer 2300 NEX is the best electronics product I have ever purchased and that is ...
customer_reviews.text: The Pioneer 2300 NEX is the best electronics product I have ever purchased and that is saying a lot. I am an electronics aficionado. All you do is plug in the lightning cable and virtually all of the capabilities of the iPhone are right there on the big beautiful screen. For the price, Best Buy couldn’t even come close. I had them install it for $100 with a $85 back up camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases of my life
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases of my life. Install was easy, except for finding the correct 12v accessory fuse, but that was Chevy's fault, not Pioneer's. I literally just tell my car what to do now. Call my wife? Done. Text her? Done. Play any song I want? Just ask (with Google Play Music). Navigate via Google Maps? Done. I can't recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great unit at a very good price.
customer_reviews.text: Great unit, the touch screen is very responsive despite being resistive. A very light touch works just fine. CarPlay is a great feature and hard to find at this price point. Installation manual was clear and easy to understand, got it all in without issue. Works very well with the micro bypass so definitely pick one of those up. Pic of wiring shows Mito-02 for Mitsubishi, aswc1, micro bypass and backup camera!
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice entry level touchscreen, plenty of inputs and adjustments
customer_reviews.text: Decent head unit for the price. Lots of adjustments and features, good responsive screen, illumination matching is a nice touch.. Has played every file type I have thrown at it, mp3, flac, move, etc etc.. Screen tends to wash out in the direct sun but most any screen will. Wish it had 2 usb ports but can't beat this unit for the price. Fit perfectly in my double din opening on my 2006 Impreza using factory brackets. Great way to upgrade your stock unit without breaking the bank. This review is for the AVH2300nex
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Best android auto system.
customer_reviews.text: Its best system specially for android auto and with back up camera + satellite radio. Don't forget to update the firmware. With this system and same speaker that came with my prius i can see the difference in sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sctrojan_81

customer_reviews.title: No video streaming 👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: You apparently can’t cast videos from your phone. U can use it as a hard drive and play files but no streaming video. WTH? For this price you definitely should be able to and it should have hd radio and preferably WiFi or Bluetooth tethering so u can use apps on the screen. Amazon sells tons of android stereos for around $100 and your telling me for $300 pioneer can’t incorporate something new other than roughly the same electronic guts for over the past 10 years probably longer.! Where’s the R & D at Pioneer?
customer_reviews.author: Hellcatdaddy

customer_reviews.title: Bought for carplay and backup camera.  Works great.
customer_reviews.text: First product review ever for me. I bought this stereo for my son's 2008 Mustang and was so pleased I wanted to post a review. Bought this specifically so he could have navigation using Apple carplay and backup camera. I soldered and shrink-wrapped all wires out of an abundance of caution. This was my first stereo install and it really was not bad at all. I like it so much i will probably replace my truck stereo with one of these as well.
customer_reviews.author: k parkhurst

customer_reviews.title: Extremely dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Package showed exactly what I ordered. Opened box and it wasn’t the correct radio. It wasn’t new. Connected to bench test and it wouldn’t even power on.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Whatever came factory is probably better than this poorly programmed distraction.
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive for the performance. Clunky and slow. No nav over Bluetooth. USB port does not support quick charge. Menus are crappy and are poorly planned out. Was better off with my tacform mount and phone. Phone just ends up teathered to the usb port right next to it anyway. USB charges s9 painfully slow. So in the end, I've got an expensive radio my girlfriend doesn't like to use, Android auto is almost inoperative, and I'm still keeping a separate phone charger in the car to top up the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Absolute, unmitigated piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This head unit seems quite nice...when it works. Ever since I bought it, I have done nothing but troubleshoot it. While driving, it randomly shuts off and then turns back on. All the wiring is correct, and the yellow, black, and red connections were checked with a voltmeter to confirm that power is indeed flowing from the car through the harness. Save your money and get something else. I will never buy Pioneer again as long as I live.
customer_reviews.author: KMT

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: Has randomly shut off twice with no way to turn it back on. Freezes and crashes during maps as well. Does this with iOS and Android as well. Really consider the risk you run by buying this device here. If you go to a installation shop they usually stand behind their products (even if it’s the EXACT same product as here for a higher price) It’s worth it for peace of mind knowing you don’t have to pay for installation and RE-installation because you were cheap like me. This is a luxury, if your going to spend the money, spend it well.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade over stock
customer_reviews.text: Great upgrade over stock. Used with appropriate kit and harness and then updated the firmware. Screen is responsive and the unit has enough features and power for me. Sound quality and adjustment is excellent. Quick boot time and reliable phone pairing with great caller audio. Mounted included microphone on steering column and the audio is clean and clear.
customer_reviews.author: TechRON

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Was 5 star . Won't connect Bluetooth and Android auto disconnects randomly after a couple mins. Disappointed. Installed in a 2018 car, non smoker.
customer_reviews.author: John evans

customer_reviews.title: Great deck
customer_reviews.text: I reccomend this deck to anyone looking to upgrade their audio system. This stereo will enhance the sound of any speakers, stock or aftermarket. It has tons of different equalizers on it. I also love the different color combinations you can do with this. Just make sure when you install it, that you plug in the supplied usb extender to the back. You need to plug your phone in through it to access the android auto/apple carplay feature.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: ITS OVER 9000
customer_reviews.text: It's a solid unit. I like my sound control but it doesn't have a clear front/back fad control. Still sounds good. The bluetooth media audio has a slit delay but well play through your phone pretty ok. Not hard to navigate the audio source menu. The nice thing is the unit has the capability to be upgraded with navigation and a backup camera. I installed myself was not hard with installation ket made for my car. Advice would to get the bypass kit for park brake. Makes life easier if installing your self. Hands free works flawlessly and is one of the main reason for the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lane Schmeltz

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this unit in a 2005 Lexus RX330 because the factory stereo was so outdated. I drive 100 miles round trip, for work, 5 days a week, and wanted something that would play music, from my phone, and audio book CD’s, I checkout from the local library. The Apple Carplay was just a bonus. I’m no audiophile, but the sound quality, to my ears, is very good. With the correct bezel, and a multitude of wiring harnesses, I installed it myself in about 3 hours while retaining the factory steering wheel controls, and the factory amplifier.
customer_reviews.author: Chad P.

customer_reviews.title: Android Auto is Unreliable on this Model
customer_reviews.text: My system allows me to connect via USB only for a few minutes and then fails. The Pioneer website seems to blame it on the cable, but I've tried 3 different cables, including a 6" cable and the cable my phone shipped with (HTC). I can connect my phone to my computer for data transfers with no problem. If I were to do this again, I would just buy a bluetooth model, because that's essentially what mine has become.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Looks and sounds great minus some issues
customer_reviews.text: Been having a few issues when connecting an older gen ipod via usb and had to reset the interface a few different times. Haven't looked into all potential compatibility issues since everyone has an iphone but it would be nice to connect to the older 180 gb device
customer_reviews.author: Rory

customer_reviews.title: Good way to get Android auto or Carplay without paying too much
customer_reviews.text: The screen is not as touch sensitive as the fancier units but it seems to get the job done. The only thing which is not so great is the factory UI is sort of clunky, but when you have launched android auto or carplay, it will override that UI of course. I wish it had two USB inputs or a USB + SD card, because you can't keep a music library on usb stick and then run android auto at the same time. However if you store all your music on your phone it isn't a problem.
customer_reviews.author: InternetUser124901

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade from another pioneer (4000NEX)
customer_reviews.text: I love this unit even more than the one I had in my car previously. The volume controls are so much better as you can actually mute navigation when you don't want it talking over your music. You can also set the volume levels individually, meaning the music volume and notification volume can be set at different levels. There are some other software updates that my old unit (no longer supported) didnt get and I am very happy with it. The only downside is that the unit only has one USB port. My old unit had two and I could have my iphone and ipod plugged in at the same time and switch sorces to play either.
customer_reviews.author: T E

customer_reviews.title: Only works in warm weather, no warranty
customer_reviews.text: Radio worked fine for a few months then when it was cold out the radio would start messing up the sound. It would act like it was fading the sound to the right front speaker super loud then after awhile it would get really quiet then loud again. Works fine when it’s above 60 out, but any colder and the radio is a waste of time to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: AVH Poineer 2400 NEX was sent
customer_reviews.text: Not sure got to rate this. I was sent the 2400nex which they look about 90% similar the only thing I think is that the 2300 might have grid lines for a back up camera which the 2400 doesn’t seem to have the same features but I didn’t realaize till I already had it installed and I’m. It taking it back out. Everything else works great... I’d give the 2400 a 4 star, losing one just for the lack of grid lines but if the 2300 is anything like it then I’m sure you will be satisfied. (Installed in a 2014 frontier)
customer_reviews.author: Timbotron

customer_reviews.title: The Best!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has JVC, daughter has Kenwood both are top of the line and both suck not easy to use and both keep dropping Samsung phones. I got in my car this radio detected my phone easy pairing and has never dropped it. So easy to use. I can listen to my phones music or my tablets books I was reading when I had to run out to pick something up and didn't want to put book down so I up to over to Text to Speech.
customer_reviews.author: V BOhling

customer_reviews.title: DVD/CD component doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: CD/DVD player broke a little after 1 year...it stopped playing anything, suddenly gave an error message on day on the screen. Had it uninstalled, fixed, and reinstalled twice! Which took time and money! Broke a third time and definitely will not send it back for another repair! Other than cheap parts manufacturing on the DVD/CD component (that's what the certified repair techs under warranty in NY told me) the rest of it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Head Unit!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just installed this into my '12 Jeep Wrangler JKU and it looks/sounds/performs great! Be sure to get the iDatalink Maestro RR interface module so that you can maintain all steering wheel controls, as well as to see/view vehicle diagnostics right on the head unit. It's awesome! I also like the larger 7" touchscreen with the dvd insert hidden behind the motorized touchscreen. Apple CarPlay works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Barry Tiemann

customer_reviews.title: 2012 F-150 install
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on a 2012 Ford F-150. It was a straight forward install. I bought the install kit from amazon with the wiring harness and double din faceplate. Unfortunately the wiring harness provided with that kit did not have a 12v switched accessory connection. The required wiring harness for the 2012 is FD5000. Once I bought that everything went smoothe as butter. I am waiting for my reverse camera to come in and will update my review after the install. I instantly noticed a difference in the speaker sound and the Apple CarPlay works amazing! Just plug in and you are good to go! Hopefully my review helps some with making a decision on this product!
customer_reviews.author: Vonk

customer_reviews.title: BLUETOOTH DOESN'T SYNC
customer_reviews.text: The sound is whatever. The unit works well and has a lot of cool functions. It was exactly what I need. But i HATE this thing because the sound from bluetooth is about 3 seconds behind which is maddening. I have no idea how to fix it. I've looked everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I've ever added to this truck!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is amazing. Truck is a dealer installed sub that used to sound "ok" at best, now that thing hits!!!! Android auto works well and is easy to set up. Gets you navigation without spending $800-1000 on a higher end unit.
customer_reviews.author: James Collins

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade to a motorhome
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in my motorhome and so far it exceeds my expectations. Android Auto, after the firmware update, is incredible. The ipod menu is accessible via bluetooth. Sounds good, looks good, allows for hands off the phone driving while still having navigation, voice calls and text messages.
customer_reviews.author: Dano195

customer_reviews.title: Works with correct wiring
customer_reviews.text: Works fine so far still using it but had a few problems like only 2 or 3 times the unit just turns off and won't turn on unless I turn off the car for like 30 seconds and then turn it back on IDK y it does it but ya it did it and then IDK if I did something wrong but I can only bring up the camera manually it doesn't turn on automatically but I think I wired it wrong and then this thing doesn't take USB hub and it's a pain to update cuz it only takes certain kinds of USB but all in all works for wat I need it so I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Good unit, problems with steering wheel control interface
customer_reviews.text: Good head unit, however my BMW steering wheel controls will not function with this after proper installation. Head unit steering wheel control input is defective or something, controls were even tested and the signals are being recieved from the steering wheel buttons through the input jack and interface module, radio just doesn't respond to them. Most likely defective part in the head unit. Controls work on other double din units.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Everything you need in a high quality stereo for your car. Apple play is sweet and being able to adjust all the sound eq settings is nice. Adjust to your taste and pair this head unit with in a 2008 Altima with the stock Bose amp and infinity ref series speakers all around is down right excellent. I definitely will buy another one soon down the road
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Cuellar

customer_reviews.title: Problems in less than a year!!
customer_reviews.text: I regret buying this unit soooo much!!! After having it for only two months the radio would very often stop playing after maybe 20 seconds. I was disappointed, but it's such a pain to change out that I decided I could live with just my bluetooth. Now the unit wont turn itself off when I turn off my car. It drained my battery over the past four days since I haven't had to drive anywhere. Now my car is dead. I guess I will be removing this unit after all.
customer_reviews.author: brytegirl411

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: Good double DIN unit. Many features and extras for the cost. This is an older model, but I opted for this unit because it had the option to use DVD/CDs, USB devices, rear backup camera video, and Apple carplay. Only knock, it doesn't come with the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating Piece of Trash -
customer_reviews.text: Connectivity issues since day one - whether it's Bluetooth, Spotify or Android Auto. Crashes often, randomly loses power and restarts. This was installed by Best Buy, so it's not bad installation that's at fault. Frustrating piece of equipment. I wanted to put my fist through this head unit many times. Never buying Pioneer again.
customer_reviews.author: RMish

customer_reviews.title: Great unit with a decently believable interface.
customer_reviews.text: Great unit! Tons of features, and a decent interface. I hate how all interfaces have to look all cluttered and off putting but this one does a nice job of keeping it fairly clean. Still looks a bit after market but its one of the least silly looking headunits on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Slade Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Needs time to warm up
customer_reviews.text: my unit seems to sometimes need time to warm up before it will connect to my iPhone. I have to leave the phone unplugged for about 5 minutes after I start my car before it will connect. If I leave it connected, the head unit will never recognize the connection. It’s a bit annoying
customer_reviews.author: Nitin

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Sometimes android auto acts up with is ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Sometimes android auto acts up with is annoying but I'm guessing that is a android auto software issue. I'm in search of a firmware update to hopefully correct the problem
customer_reviews.author: Darwin

customer_reviews.title: android auto
customer_reviews.text: this is absolutly worth the money, i didnt care for the gps upgrade so i saved a little money there since i use it on my android auto, overall im extremely happy with it. easy to use, sound upgrade was not bad, though im on a factory amp now and getting ready to go all aftermarket so the custom EQ will be a nice benefit, as it has a lot of range for setting to my preferences
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer AVH-2300NEX
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice radio. The sound and functions including being able to bluetooth to answer a phone and also play music from an iPhone. It is exactly what I had needed with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCust 06

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome radio.
customer_reviews.text: Big increase in sound over my factory unit. It has every option I could ask for. Connect to Bluetooth as soon as I turn my vehicle on and was very easy to install. I love all of the option that this radio has for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Great radio, good price
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to car audio, pioneer makes good equipment. This radio works. It's simple to use and has lots of features! Android Auto is easy to connect and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jonr1138

customer_reviews.title: Android auto not working.
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I see with this head unit, is that Android auto, does not recognize either of my phone's anymore. I have uninstalled AA and reinstalled with the same result. AA and ACP are very finicky. Most of the time it doesn't work. And there is no way to reset the head unit.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan W.

customer_reviews.title: Time and Date Never Stays Current
customer_reviews.text: I Loved this Radio till I seen that the Time and Date Doesnt Stay Updated and I ordered a replacement and the same thing still occurs so I will be sending it back and Will be getting a different radio all together
customer_reviews.author: Melinda C

customer_reviews.title: Great unit, slight audio lag
customer_reviews.text: VERY good unit. Has everything i was looking for. However there is a slight bluetooth lag that is considerably noticeable when watching videos on your phone. Otherwise very nice unit
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be Happier
customer_reviews.text: I love this head unit. I have a 2013 Jeep Wrangler and after a few hours and a couple YouTube videos later I couldn’t be happier. Everything works as advertised and it was easy to install. I used the Maestro Rr and the CH1 wiring harness so I could still use all my factory steering wheel buttons. I highly recommend this to anyone looking for Apple car play in their vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: William jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my wife's SUV. Really made a difference to the looks of the interior. Works great and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: gary e guerra

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this radio unit. Apple car play is amazing. I would give 5 stars but I don’t know why when I turn on the vehicle and the radio turns up, my radio station is changed to the next one and the volume goes down to 0 and the camera display shows up although my reverse camera is not turned up. Hopefully this just happens when I turn on the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Constantly resets itself and deletes all settings ☹️
customer_reviews.text: Shuts off constantly. Buttons have reversed, there is no way to turn down the volume. Resets itself and deletes all the settings. Can’t get pioneer on the phone ever. This unit is 4 months old and is trash.
customer_reviews.author: eweeks9

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: sound quality from this is fantastic my only complaint is I haven't found a way to get the standard picture on the main screen to go away on the right side it looks like the old timing dial and I haven't found a way to change that. Other than that is been fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Wes Brown

customer_reviews.title: No Android Auto
customer_reviews.text: This unit if it works is fine. I have had it for several months and after getting a new Pixel 3 the unit no longer supports Android Auto which for me was the reason I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: D. Whitcomb

customer_reviews.title: Heat affects performance
customer_reviews.text: Seems like if it get hot inside from being parked Android Auto doesn't work correctly. But once the AC gets it cool it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Cody G

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully with idatalink and android auto
customer_reviews.text: Love this unit. Needed something that would work with the maestro rr and this does beautifully. Had issues with android auto would crash and such with my mote 9 but turned out to be my cable. My favorite head u it ever ..
customer_reviews.author: billfromkcmo

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is poor on stock speakers. But I bought this as a replacement for my stock headunit and if you go my route with a highs amp for my aftermarket midrange and tweeters. The cross over is great and easy to use. Apple play is great. No need for gps just mirror off of phone.
customer_reviews.author: Bigk24

customer_reviews.title: Best upgrade I’ve made to my truck!
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a 2010 Toyota Tundra. Kept factory speakers and it sounds great. So nice to have Apple CarPlay - it works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Price

customer_reviews.title: Great stereo. The feature that I really love is ...
customer_reviews.text: Great stereo. The feature that I really love is the ability to plug into my phone and navigation appears on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Jim A Chiaramonte

customer_reviews.title: This is a great unit. Took some small modifications to get it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit. Took some small modifications to get it into my 2008 Jeep, but I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Astro Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Best double din out right now.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic unit. Easier to use than the OE units in two other cars of mine which was a surprise. I used to be a big Kenwood fan back when doubledins with navigation first came out. The amount of functionality you get for so little money is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Nice receiver
customer_reviews.text: Nice radio. I have a high end Kenwood in my H2 and if I had to do it over would have bought the Pioneer instead
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! Looks amazing!! Sounds amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! You just can’t beat pioneer. Apple car play is simply a dream come true.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic. Best aftermarket radio I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: So the cassette deck (for a cassette to aux adapter) I've been using in my 2005 Prius broke and I decided to purchase this in order to get Android auto. Installation was fairly simple and it fit without needing to cut anything. (A simple dash kit is all you need). The sound is excellent even with stock speakers. At least these Android auto units have finally come down to a semi reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Very poor user interface
customer_reviews.text: The worst experience ever with a car stereo. Freezes, slow, problems with the app radio, Android auto, cant play the DVD. Just very poor at up. The Bluetooth feature works great, than when you decide to plug in to your phone the problems occur. Very unhappy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: anthony lafountaine

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: For the money that its worth it makes things easy eith apple car play and android auto.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: It does not work the screen is black and say Caution The Video may appear reversed I purchased a Keelead Rear View Camera and no support from pioneer I like the radio everything else is good but my other ...
customer_reviews.text: I brought it so I could have a backup camera, It does not work the screen is black and say Caution The Video may appear reversed I purchased a Keelead Rear View Camera and no support from pioneer I like the radio everything else is good but my other radio work just fine, I needed a backup camera and thought I would give this a try
customer_reviews.author: SN Movie Watcher 9890

customer_reviews.title: Great radio!!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Apple CarPlay was the main reason I purchased. Beautiful display. Easy to install yourself and suggest the parking brake mod so you don’t have to engage the parking brake to watch movies and interact with maps while driving. Love the option to have custom background. Overall A+ product!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!! ⭐️
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my Hyundai Tucson 2013 and I’m so happy with it, I love the fact that comes with Apple CarPlay, I also got the dashboard adapter so it looks great, and also bought a backup camera and works perfect with it, I’m very happy with this product! The installation was expensive though but it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel C.

customer_reviews.title: It's totally useless unless you install the parking brake switch bypass
customer_reviews.text: Android Auto sometimes takes 5 minutes or longer to recognize using Anker Power line+ USB-C cable. It's totally useless unless you install the parking brake switch bypass. With the bypass in and AutoEQ performed it sounds and works fantastic though. Will never get a non-Android head unit again. Using GM1 adapter for my steering wheel controls.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Aughenbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work fine but...
customer_reviews.text: I have a feeling this isn't new. Possibly a floor model. There were lots of fingerprints on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Willie E Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on my Escalade.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an older Pioneer unit for this newer one. It’s pretty nice so far. The touchscreen is responsive and the layout is easy to use. I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Del Aguila

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience
customer_reviews.text: it is to long to fit into a 2017 hyundai sonata. part of the casing shows at the top. i have yet to update the firmware.... but android auto doesnt seem to be a thing on it. we shall see if the update fixes that. which it doesnt say it does on the patch notes. looks good. works well. sounds really good. bluetooth connects in like 2 seconds which is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great radio for the price love the apple car play. Touch screen is decent but for the price can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Theluge

customer_reviews.title: Good radio! Android auto not good
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth is good for phone and media! The backup camera is good! Android auto is not working so good! When I touch my phone it's going off etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits on 05-09 Mustang v6
customer_reviews.text: I install this radio on my 2005 mustang v6 and is perfect !
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: could be better
customer_reviews.text: this is good product and could be better. hard to work with android but apple is good. not all apps are supported and when you disconnect map stops working on cellphone
customer_reviews.author: kunwar

customer_reviews.title: Apps are limited and not everything works with bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: Good overall. I was expecting to be able to do everything through bluetooth!
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Google assistant with the phone. Ade life easy. Responsive touch screen. Buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Brian smith

customer_reviews.title: Must buy your vehicles wiring harness!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Fits perfectly in my Sierra. Screen clear and apple car play is nice. Listen carefully. You must buy your vehicles radio harness.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie Wells

customer_reviews.title: Very responsive and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stereo! Got it professionally installed by a local shop but man it works great! Love the apple carplay. Love the Bluetooth. Love that it reads your text messages for you and sends them just by talking to it and telling it to send the message. Reverse camera is nice and clear. It’s just a very good responsive setup. Would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a good stereo to be able to stream music, play movies, make phone calls etc.
customer_reviews.author: Renato Martin del Campo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stero
customer_reviews.text: Probably more than I'll ever need but sounds so much better than the stock unit it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Good stereo
customer_reviews.text: I'd say this is one of the best choices for aftermarket radios, especially for the price. The only gripe that I have is that the Bluetooth is really laggy, the latency is about 4 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Grisham

customer_reviews.title: Love the touch screen and features!!
customer_reviews.text: Had radio installed at local shop yesterday. So far I love it! Bought a camera to go with it and awesome pic on that screen.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my Pioneer
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to install, I installed it myself in my Lexus RX330. Apple CarPlay works great in this. Google maps, Spotify, and iHeartRadio all work seamlessly in this HU. So far working and sounding great.
customer_reviews.author: Rafi U. Khan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Stereo!!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, Great control of audio, Can't be Pioneer!! Options on radio are excellent! Would totally recommend to anyone!!! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: You will love it
customer_reviews.text: Pioneer has always been great. Apple car play works as good as the other more expensive head units.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Gadget town is not an authorized seller of pioneer. ...
customer_reviews.text: Gadget town is not an authorized seller of pioneer. If the product fails, pioneer will not warranty. I bought this,,after having it installed for a couple of weeks, it completely died. As instructed by the pioneer website, I sent the unit to a pioneer authorized repair center. I got a letter from the repair center today stating that I would have to cover the cost of repair, starting with a $45 diagnostic fee.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Webb

customer_reviews.title: Get a flip screen radio if you got a 2002 tahoe not a double din
customer_reviews.text: Two months pass and my Bluetooth don't work only for music but not for calling my buttons don't work no more on the device I can't open my DVD and it's plenty more that don't work I'm disappointed and it didn't fit my vehicle like they say it do I had to make it fit
customer_reviews.author: Carlos W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: It works beautifully! CarPlay is perfect for me and the backup camera we installed with it works nicely with the stereo. Great investment for my car.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: For the price, can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.text: For $309 you can’t beat it. Sure it doesn’t have Retina display resolution, but it’s good enough. Interface with Waze through app radio is a little funky. Won’t play music while displaying the Waze video, but you can switch back and forth easily enough. Minor complaints. Overall, UI and sound quality are solid.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Milhollin

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible radio for the price! Apple car play kicks ass! We bought the park bypass and backup camera.
customer_reviews.author: L G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome features for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Replaced factory nav unit. Love having car play. Have not tried DVD player
customer_reviews.author: AKDieselTech

customer_reviews.title: Tons of features
customer_reviews.text: Been working great, use the pioneer app already on the head unit to stream videos from youtube.
customer_reviews.author: Dev Dev

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install for someone whose done it before. If you aren’t familiar with the type of install may require some help. Great product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn Y

customer_reviews.title: ... head unit installed for about a week and I love it. Sounds
customer_reviews.text: I've had this head unit installed for about a week and I love it. Sounds amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice in my car.  I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Have to purchase 2xdin adapters to make installation look nice. Perfect for my 2005 Nissan maxima.
customer_reviews.author: Brother_me

customer_reviews.title: bad buy
customer_reviews.text: This radio is basiclly an am/fm radio. seirus and navigation all have to be bought seperately and at a horrific price,Just go buy a factory radio so you dont have all the bulk of the add ons
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great radio! Works real smooth and CarPlay is great! DVD picture quality is superb!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: pioneer avh 2300nex
customer_reviews.text: I love this radio...it fits so perfect in my dodge charger srt8 and the sound quality is so crisp ...love the android auto and the way I could play pandora and Spotify...will recommend to everyone....
customer_reviews.author: alejandro deleon

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. ApplePlay and Android Auto work flawlessly. I prefer the ApplePlay as Android locks your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Randall D. St John

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good product my main issue is I’ve been having trouble with microphone not picking up voice sometimes it works and others it don’t other than that the sound and look is great
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Davila

customer_reviews.title: Installed on a 2002 Audi a4
customer_reviews.text: great Radio. So far has been working perfect. Even sound improved after installing . Only thing i can’t get to figure out it’s how to set Siri on it. Other than that radio works and looks great
customer_reviews.author: Allan martinez

product_meta.title: Pioneer AVH-2300NEX Multimedia DVD Receiver with 7" WVGA Display, Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, Built-in Bluetooth, SiriusXM-Ready and AppRadio Mode +
product_meta.description: Pioneer NEX or networked entertainment experience line of receivers feature an innovative and powerful new user interface which is responsive and highly customizable. The NEX models are designed especially for today's smart phone driven lifestyle. The AVH-2300NEX features Apple carplay, the smarter, safer and more fun way to use your iPhone in the car. Apple carplay gives iPhone users an incredibly intuitive way to make calls, use maps, listen to music, and access messages with just a word or a touch.
feature_bullets: In Dash Double Din DVD Receiver with 7" Display
Apple CarPlay, Android Auto and AppRadio Mode+ Compatible
SiriusXM Ready (requires tuner sxv300 and subscription to service, sold seperately; not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars707 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
